body.name: LTMEUTY Bedroom Dresser - Wooden Dresser for Bedroom, 7 Drawers Horizontal Dresser, Rustic Style Bedroom Furniture, Chest of Dresser, Brown Wood Grain
features: 【Classic Bedroom Dresser】-- Wood finish and simple style with charming metal handle give this 7-drawer dresser a enduring look. Natural, easy going style to your bedroom.
【7 Storage Drawers】-- Wide dresser chest with 7 independent drawers to help your sort items by type. Perfect for organizing clothes, blankets, scarves, socks and other accessories.

【Sturdy Wooden Cabinet】-- Made of durable P2 particle board, which is odor-free and environmentally friendly to be better used in bedroom. Added extra invisible feet under cabinet make this chest dresser more stable.

【Safety First】-- LTMEUTY wood dresser is set up with 2 pieces anti-tip device, which can insure safety in normal use. Protect your pets, and other members of your household from getting hurt or injured. (Age grading: 12+ years )

【Easy to Assemble】-- Assembling this multifunctional dresser takes up very little time, with clear and simple assembly instructions. Please feel free to let us know if there is any problem or suggestion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what we needed it for!
reviews.reviewText: We needed a small dresser and we didn't want it to take up a lot of space. This was perfect. It looks nice, it's drawers glide very smoothly and it was pretty easy to put together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WILL FALL APART WHILE BUILDING
reviews.reviewText: I am in the process of building this product and, despite using the recommended tools, I have had multiple screws break off in the holes to the point where I cannot even build the product. The wood paneling broke off so bad in places while putting pieces together that I cannot re-adjust the screws in those holes. I wouldn’t trust this to hold anything if it can’t even be build because the material is SO flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loved that it had 7 drawers!!!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser was not the easiest to build but it stores a lot and I loved the three drawers on top. They are the perfect size for smaller clothing items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Arrived on time.
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived in time as advertised. The dresser is not as well built as I anticipated. The directions are a little hrd to follow with jut pictures. I bought two, so th second one went togethwr easier than the first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: very good and sturdy dresser. It's perfect for young kids. The drawers are on the small side, but there are several of them to make up for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars PLEASE DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: Please please please, spend $230 on a real piece of wood furniture or on a dresser elsewhere.1) This “dresser” came in a box separated into 1,000 different pieces. Mostly damaged by the way.2) The quality of the material is so bad that despite how gentle you are, you will break more “wood” off of the structure.3) Directions are not clear and with the amount of pieces required to assemble that makes it all the more frustrating.Would give 0 stars. Don’t buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
